backend/main.mo: Defines actor with mixins, user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, SOS snapshots, and access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence report describing a Quick Share addition and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files covering routing, hooks, utilities, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, app layout, theme provider, and initialization handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access denied message with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Checks admin role and shows a loader or access denied screen before rendering protected admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Protects routes by requiring Internet Identity login and showing a login prompt when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper with header, sidebar or mobile menu, main content area, and footer, conditioned on user identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation menu that highlights active routes and shows admin and emergency options based on user role.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top header with app branding, share button, emergency lookup link, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, viewing, copying, and rotating a user's emergency access code and principal ID.
Form for saving next-of-kin and medical information tied to the stored emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and create a profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Handles selecting, validating, uploading, and displaying status of license and ID verification documents.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Renders a styled flyer preview with QR code, share URL, and static promotional content. Uses refs to display a generated QR code and show loading state.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Provides a modal for generating and sharing a QR code and link, including copy, download, quick share, and navigation to a flyer page. Manages QR generation and share actions with state and toasts.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Displays emergency contact details and last known location for first responders, including health info and map links. Shows SOS snapshot data if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes. Initializes access control using a secret parameter if available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication. Handles identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend user, verification, and place APIs using the actor. Supports fetching profiles, roles, places, and performing mutations like creation and uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables plus base element styles.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a formatted access code using localStorage with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size and type for uploads and provides a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Converts a flyer DOM element to a high‑resolution PNG via SVG foreignObject and triggers a download.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps browser geolocation to return coordinates with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Defines readable labels and options for PlaceCategory values and a helper to fetch labels.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Generates a QR code by requesting an external API and drawing the result onto a canvas.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Converts a canvas to a PNG blob and downloads it as a file.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements Web Share API with clipboard fallback and returns share status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app's base share URL from window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date and bigint timestamps and formats them for display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Gets and removes URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash‑based routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page allowing authenticated users to add a new place with validation and API submission.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a route with start, destination, optional waypoints, date/time, and notes, then submitting via a createRoute mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin interface to look up a user by Principal ID and approve or reject their verification status.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Public emergency lookup page requiring a Principal ID and access code to fetch and display emergency profile data.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates a shareable flyer with a QR code, supports auto-export, manual download, and copying the share link.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page showing feature highlights and redirecting authenticated users to the places page.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a selected place including location, category, description, and submitter.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable list of places with category selection and optional add-place button for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the logged‑in user's profile with verification uploads and emergency settings, handling loading and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing a simple route detail view with navigation back to the route list.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Lists the user's routes and allows searching routes by principal ID, with tabs for personal and searched routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the user's emergency SOS card if available, loading emergency data using the stored access code.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Allows capturing a one‑time SOS location snapshot and provides navigation to view the SOS card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking app summary, architectural notes, issues, and a list of implemented features with requirement IDs and versions.
